snippet: A guard assigned to watch over an Afghan soldier accused of shooting coalition members instead helped him escape, the authorities said.
abstract: Afghan officials say guard assigned to watch over Afghan soldier arrested in shooting death of one coalition soldier and wounding of four others instead helped him escape.

byline.contributor: Taimoor Shah contributed reporting from Kandahar, Afghanistan.

lead_paragraph: A guard assigned to watch over an Afghan soldier accused of shooting coalition members instead helped him escape, the authorities said.

headline.main: Afghan Accused in Attack Escapes With His Guard
headline.print_headline: Afghan Accused in Attack Escapes With His Guard
